Want to Know me..!

Welcome to my portfolio! My skill set spans a variety of modern technologies, for building interactive UIs, backend development, and for client-side scripting. With a strong foundation in Vite, Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS, I excel at creating visually appealing, high-performance websites that deliver seamless user experiences.

My Works

My Trainer

In this project I presented myself as a fitness trainer where my meals, diet and workout plans are available. This UI is created uses a simple but stylish design to impress the client and provides solution to choose thier own way of training by providing 4 main category of hybrid training.

Technology used
Taste-Munch

In this project I created a simple UI of any random restraunt which needs its stratup to have an impressive push on the customer by having a impressive UI based online app of its restraunt. So it can get digital customer and even get helpe in increasing its bussiness. It is a fronted UI of Restraunt Stratup providing multiple services.

Technology used
To Do

I created a simple todo-list of any random users which needs its to have an impressive push on the customer by having a impressive UI based online app of its restraunt. So it can get digital customer and even get helpe in increasing its bussiness. It is a fronted UI of Restraunt Stratup providing multiple services.

Technology used
Typing Speed Challenge

This project consist of very basic HTML, CSS and Javascript concept creating a challenge to type the random paragraphs at fast as you can. This is an interesting game to challenege your typing skills and test your fingers on your board. Random paras will come and you have to be as fast as you can. Are you Ready..?
